alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 01 at 6:54AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by heavy rainfall is possible WHERE...All Islands WHEN...Through Saturday IMPACTS...Flash flooding in low-lying areas and possible landslides. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A surface to mid-level trough will hold the potential for flash flooding through the end of the week. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 651 Taeao Aso Lulu Fepuari 1 2023 ...UA IAI LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE ASO TOONA`I... MAFUAAGA...E ono faatupulaia lologa ma tafega i timuga mamafa. NOFOAGA...Motu uma o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Toona`i. AAFIAGA...E aafia nofoaga maualalo ma e ono solo mauga FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...E faatupulaia lologa ma tafega i nisi o taimi a o tumau uiga louloua o le tau i luga o le atunu`u. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
